<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_ex_sp_todo_filter</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Restrict duplicate filter name</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
var todoFilterLabelGr = new GlideRecord("sn_ex_sp_todo_filter"); todoFilterLabelGr.addQuery("name",current.getValue("name")); todoFilterLabelGr.addQuery("sys_id","!=",current.sys_id); todoFilterLabelGr.query(); if(todoFilterLabelGr.next()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("{0} : {1} already exists.",[current.getElement("name").getLabel(), current.getDisplayValue("name")])); current.setAbortAction(true); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-28 12:26:11</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>11a0d9c3eb030110226ed5c1525228a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Restrict duplicate filter name</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_11a0d9c3eb030110226ed5c1525228a9</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-29 06:35:33</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=11a0d9c3eb030110226ed5c1525228a9"/> </record_update>
